name: Vertex Energy, Inc.
description: Vertex Energy, Inc. is a leading specialty refiner and marketer of high-quality refined petroleum products. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Vertex focuses on the recycling and re-refining of used motor oil and other petroleum waste streams. The company's innovative processes enable it to produce a variety of products, including base oils and specialty lubricants that meet or exceed the stringent requirements of the petroleum industry. Vertex Energy operates multiple processing facilities across the United States, utilizing advanced technologies that significantly reduce environmental impact while maximizing the recovery of valuable resources. The company's commitment to sustainability is evident in its efforts to promote circular economy principles, reduce greenhouse gas emissions, and support cleaner energy solutions. Vertex Energy has experienced significant growth through strategic acquisitions and partnerships, positioning itself as a key player in the transition to a more sustainable energy landscape. Its mission is to provide customers with reliable, high-quality products while maintaining a strong focus on environmental stewardship and operational excellence.
